include_directories(../../include)

add_custom_command(
  OUTPUT err_data.c
  COMMAND $***REMOVED***GO_EXECUTABLE***REMOVED*** run err_data_generate.go > $***REMOVED***CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR***REMOVED***/err_data.c
  DEPENDS
  err_data_generate.go
  asn1.errordata
  bio.errordata
  bn.errordata
  cipher.errordata
  conf.errordata
  dh.errordata
  digest.errordata
  dsa.errordata
  ecdh.errordata
  ecdsa.errordata
  ec.errordata
  engine.errordata
  evp.errordata
  hkdf.errordata
  obj.errordata
  pem.errordata
  pkcs8.errordata
  rsa.errordata
  ssl.errordata
  x509.errordata
  x509v3.errordata
  WORKING_DIRECTORY $***REMOVED***CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR***REMOVED***
)

add_library(
  err

  OBJECT

  err.c
  err_data.c
)
